landing.title: Your Own Character
landing.subtitle: Grow with Comitchu, a service that visualizes your GitHub commit activity. Today's single line of code is a single step for your character.

howToCopy.title: How to Use Comitchu
howToCopy.subtitle: Click the copy button to save to clipboard.

githubLogin.title: Login with GitHub
githubLogin.subtitle: Get started easily with your GitHub account.

commitSystem.title: Commit-Based Growth System
commitSystem.subtitle: Your character grows and levels up as you commit.

customization.title: Customizable Characters
customization.subtitle: Decorate your character with various skins.

howToUnlock.title: How to Unlock
howToUnlock.subtitle: Commit in different languages. Skins are used!
